Welcome to the [Crump Lab](https://crumplab.com) online cognition experiment headquarters.

Anyone over the age of 18 is invited to participate in the experiments listed here.

The data that we collect is completely anonymous. We also make the data for published research publicly available. Learn more about our lab and how we use the data on the [about](about.qmd) page.
